randomFings.text: We have a dream - It might come true. This dream we want to share with you...
Insert disk one into DF0: and disk two into DF1:
But anyway: Booze, fall in love and have a mental hangover!!!!!!
Hey, little TV-child... Can't you stand the materia floating from your eyes?
...And they call these bozos, who conveniently show up, with a fake electronic lightshow...
